# xelon_template (Resource)

The template resource allows you to manage Xelon custom templates.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "xelon_template" "base" {
  device_id = "<device-id>"
  name      = "base-debian-13.2"
  tenant_id = data.xelon_tenant.current.id
}

data "xelon_tenant" "current" {}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `device_id` (String) The ID of the device from which the template will be created.
- `name` (String) The name of the template.
- `tenant_id` (String) The tenant ID of the source device.

### Optional

- `description` (String) The template description.

### Read-Only

- `category` (String) The category of the template.
- `cloud_id` (String) The ID of the cloud.
- `id` (String) The ID of the template.
- `type` (String) The type of the template.
